languages.text: [Рассмеяться] "Какое жалкое зрелище — старый преступник, затравленный и прячущийся, как крыса".
[Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."
languages.original_text: [Рассмеяться] "Какое жалкое зрелище — старый преступник, затравленный и прячущийся, как крыса".

traits.locale_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight, an old criminal looking so hounded and hiding like a rat."
[Laugh] "What a sorry sight, an old criminal looking so hounded and hiding like a rat."
[Laugh] "What a sorry sight, an old criminal looking so hounded and hiding like a rat."
[Laugh] "What a sorry sight, an old criminal looking so hounded and hiding like a rat."
[Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."
[Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

languages.text: [大笑]“你可真惨啊，一个恶名昭著的罪犯，被人到处追捕，像老鼠一样四处躲藏。”
languages.original_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

traits.locale_text: [大笑]“你可真惨啊，一个恶名昭著的罪犯，被人到处追捕，像老鼠一样四处躲藏。”

languages.text: [笑う]「惨めなものだ。年老いた犯罪者がネズミのように追い回され隠れているなんて」
languages.original_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

traits.locale_text: [笑う]「惨めなものだ。年老いた犯罪者がネズミのように追い回され隠れているなんて」

languages.text: [Reírte] «Qué espectáculo más lamentable: el viejo forajido, acorralado y escondiéndose como una rata».
languages.original_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

traits.locale_text: [Reírte] «Qué espectáculo más lamentable, un viejo criminal acorralado y escondiéndose como una rata».

languages.text: [Lachen] "Was für ein erbärmlicher Anblick, der alte Gesetzlose, ganz gehetzt versteckt er sich wie eine Ratte."
languages.original_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

traits.locale_text: [Lachen] "Was für ein erbärmlicher Anblick, ein alter Verbrecher, der so gehetzt aussieht und sich wie eine Ratte versteckt."

languages.text: [Rire] « Un vieux renégat traqué qui se terre comme un rat... En voilà, un triste spectacle. »
languages.original_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

traits.locale_text: [Rire] « Un vieux criminel traqué qui se terre comme un rat... En voilà, un triste spectacle. »

languages.text: [Kahkaha at] "Rezalete bak. Kanunsuz ihtiyar, fare gibi kaçacak delik arıyor."
languages.original_text: [Laugh] "What a sorry sight — the old outlaw, hounded and hiding like a rat."

traits.locale_text: [Kahkaha at] "Rezalete bak. İhtiyar haydut, fare gibi kaçacak delik arıyor."
